title: ADC MAINS ADD ME (support main)

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: Need good adcs to duo with add me Gunz 4 Hire

replies.body: ADC's don't waste your time, no lane pressence, no awareness, plays champs they don't know on first impressions (obviously leaving a BAD impression due to this) even messing around in a normal game.. not even worth the time, just giving yourself a headache being in the same game.
